column2: We meet currently a problem to get data of offers by API from S12.
We meet currently a problem of forwarding mails by API from S19. The problem has been identified and is being corrected by our teams.

We meet currently a problem of publication of offers by API. This error message appears : 'Publication site: Your offer has not been updated because you must specify all the sites on which your offer is published'. The problem has been identified and is being corrected by our teams.
